title: Authentication & Security
description: Learn how to implement secure authentication and authorization using JWT tokens, password hashing with bcrypt, and protected routes
learningObjectives: Implement secure password hashing with bcrypt
Create and verify JWT tokens for authentication
Build authentication middleware for route protection
Implement user registration and login endpoints
Create protected routes that require authentication
Handle authentication errors and security best practices
Test authentication flows with automated tests
Understand JWT token structure and security
